## AudioEventPayloads."AUDIO.SET\_CUTOFF\_DISTANCE" property

Emitted when the audio's cutoff distance is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[AudioEvent.SET_CUTOFF_DISTANCE]: {
        audio: Audio;
        cutoffDistance: number;
    };
```
